scripts.db:refresh-views: tsx -e "import { pool } from './lib/db/client'; pool.query('REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY mv_country_stats; REFRESH MATERIALIZED VIEW CONCURRENTLY mv_state_stats;').then(() => { console.log('✅ Materialized views refreshed'); pool.end(); });"
scripts.db:reindex: tsx -e "import { pool } from './lib/db/client'; pool.query('REINDEX TABLE occupations; VACUUM ANALYZE occupations;').then(() => { console.log('✅ Table reindexed and analyzed'); pool.end(); });"
scripts.db:backup: tsx -e "import { exec } from 'child_process'; const timestamp = new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-'); exec(`pg_dump $POSTGRES_URL > backup_${timestamp}.sql`, (err, stdout, stderr) => { if (err) { console.error('Backup failed:', err); process.exit(1); } console.log('✅ Backup completed'); });"
scripts.db:test-connection: tsx -e "import { testConnection } from './lib/db/client'; testConnection().then(result => { console.log(result.success ? '✅ Connection successful' : '❌ Connection failed'); console.log(JSON.stringify(result, null, 2)); process.exit(result.success ? 0 : 1); });"
